content: this is a small crochet frog about 2 inches tall you can also use a larger yarn size with the corresponding hooks below super bulky- 6 mm j hook jumbo- 11 5 mm hook update 3/23/2025- i ve updated the pattern to be a bit nicer to look at and hopefully a bit less confusing to read based on some feedback i ve seen in the comments thank you all for your feedback
